A frontend application that fetches all poll data dynamically from backend APIs
A backend API service that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
User interface allowing users to browse available polls and their options
Functionality for users to cast votes for specific poll options
Ability to view real-time or updated voting results for each poll
Styling with a white background color throughout the website
UI components styled with navy color as the primary accent
Database schema to store polls, poll options, and vote records
API endpoints for retrieving poll lists, individual poll details, and submitting votes
API endpoint for fetching voting results for a specific poll
Frontend routing to navigate between browsing polls, voting, and viewing results
Responsive design ensuring usability across desktop and mobile devices
Package.json configured with `install:all` script to install both frontend and backend dependencies
Package.json configured with `dev` script to start both frontend and backend concurrently
Error handling for invalid poll IDs, expired polls, or submission failures
